Package provided.ballworld.extVisitors

Interface IBallHost<H extends IBallHost<? extends H>>

Type Parameters:
H - The specific ball sub-host type
All Superinterfaces:

All Known Subinterfaces:

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface IBallHost<H extends IBallHost<? extends H>> extends IExtVisitorHost<IBallHostID,H>
Type-narrowed extended visitor host for balls. This interface needs further type-narrowing to be used in student code!
